text: Jovan Belcher (July 24, 1987 â€“ December 1, 2012) was an American football player. He was a line backer in the NFL for the Kansas City Chiefs. He was a student at the University of Maine. He played in the NFL from 2009 until his death. Belcher was born in West Babylon, New York. On the evening of December 1, 2012 in Kansas City, Missouri, he shot his partner dead and committed suicide by shooting himself.Details in Belcher murder-suicide After his death, an autopsy revealed that Belcher had been suffering from chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE). == References == == Other websites == *Pro-Football Reference Category:1987 births Category:2012 deaths Category:African-American players of American football Category:American murderers Category:Criminals from New York (state) Category:Kansas City Chiefs players Category:Murderers who committed suicide Category:Murder-suicides in the United States Category:Sportspeople from New York (state) Category:Sportspeople who committed suicide Category:Suicides by firearm in the United States
title: Jovan Belcher
